Please follow this template when reporting bugs. If your report involves
harassment, security, or a sensitive personal matter, see `CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md`
for reporting options. For confidential reports, email the maintainers at
`hubertus@hubertusbecker.com` instead of opening a public issue.

2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error
